content: **materials** *yarn malabrigo rios* malabrigo rios - ravelry red 611 150 yards 3/4 of a skein malabrigo rios - white 943 55 yards 1/4 of a skein *needles and notions* size 5 3 75mm 16 circular needle size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle set of size 7 4 5mm dpns or magic loop stitch marker tapestry needle stitch holder **measurements** *unblocked* 17 5 round 13 5 tall brim to i-cord *blocked* 20 round 14 tall brim to i-cord **stockinette heart tassle in the round** round 1 kfb twice turn and slide stitches to other end with a new dpn kfb twice 4 stitches on both dpns round 2 and all even rounds knit one round round 3 *kfb at the first stitch knit to the last stitch kfb* turn and *repeat* on 2nd dpn 6 stitches on both dpns continue working rounds 2 and 3 until there are 12 stitches on each dpn knit 3 rounds knit 6 stitches slip 12 stitches onto a stitch holder knit last 6 stitches of 2nd dpn *k2tog k2 ssk* turn and *repeat* 4 stitches on each dpn knit one round *k2tog ssk* turn and *repeat* 2 stitches on each dpn cut yarn and pull through 4 stitches return 12 stitches from stitch holder to 2 dpns knit one round with new length of yarn *k2tog k2 ssk* turn and *repeat* 4 stitches on each dpn knit one round *k2tog ssk* turn and *repeat* 2 stitches on each dpn cut yarn and pull through 4 stitches 1 https //drive google com/file/d/12dfsscpifqs3pvx-1pyrtpafmxbmtiaw/view usp=drive_link
